name: acgme-case-submitter
description: Chrome extension to auto-fill ACGME case entry forms
author: Razvan Azamfirei

scripts.package:zip: VERSION=$(bun -e "const p = await Bun.file('package.json').json(); console.log(p.version);") && bun run clean && bun run build && cd dist && zip -r ../acgme-case-submitter-v$VERSION.zip .
scripts.release:prepare: bun run check && bun run build && bun run package:zip
scripts.release:tag: VERSION=$(bun -e "const p = await Bun.file('package.json').json(); console.log(p.version);") && git tag -a v$VERSION -m "Release v$VERSION" && git push origin v$VERSION
scripts.release:publish: bun run release:prepare && bun run release:tag
